name: Future of Education Technology Conference
content: The Future of Education Technology® Conference has been known to district and school leaders, technologists, educators and support staff, as the leading education technology conference for the past 40 years. With four action-packed days of intense learning opportunities, an expansive Expo Hall and endless networking events, there is so much to explore. URL: Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/521730-2?pid=4868 Prices: Premium registration includes unlimited access to Workshops in addition to Basic registration. Rates vary by rate period.: USD 980.0, Basic Plus registration includes 2 Workshops of your choice in addition to Basic registration. More Workshops may be added for an additional fee. Rates vary by rate period.: USD 760.0, Basic registration includes all keynotes; concurrent sessions; coffee and networking breaks; receptions and special events; plus unlimited entry to the FETC® 2020 Expo Hall. Workshops require an additional registration fee. Rates vary by rate period.: USD 460.0 Time: 08:00 - 13:00 Venue Details: Miami Beach Convention Center, 1901 Convention Center Drive, Miami Beach, Florida, 33139, United States
